titleStmt.title: P.Mich.Aphrod.
Settling a Dispute: Toward a Legal Anthropology of Late Antique Egypt,
Machine readable text

div1.p:
[ *au)rh/lios *nikanti/noos *)isidw/rou suntelesth\s a)po\ kw/mhs *)afrodi/ths]
dia/gwn e)ntau=qa e)pi\ th=s *)antinoe/wn kallipo/lews *a?u)?r?h?li/?o?[is] *f?[oiba/]m?m?[wni]
*triade/lfou kai\ au)tw=| suntelesth=| kai\ th=| tou/tou gameth=| *)anastasi/a| th=| kai\
*tekrompi/a| qugatri\ *mega/lou o(rmwme/nois a)po\ th=s au)th=s kw/mhs *)afrodi/ths
dia\ sou= *)apollw=tos *diosko/rou prwtokwmh/tou t?h=s ei)rhme/nhs kw/mhs qei/ou sou
[t]h=?[s prog]egramme/nhs *)anastasi/as p?ro\s mhtro\s xai/rein. o(mologw= u(mi=n
[ta\ e(ch=s u(pot]etag?m?e/na: e)gw\ o( progegramme/nos *nikanti/noos suntelesth\s
dia/?l[u]s?i[n s]u?n?eqe/mhn kaq' kat [u(mw=n tw=n] progegramme/nwn *foiba/mmwnos kai\
*)anastasi/as th=s au)tou= au)th=s gameth=s dia\ sou= tou= prolexqe/ntos *)apollw=tos
prwtokwmh/tou prwtokomhtou e)n tw=| kata\ xw/ran politikw=| dikasthri/w| peri\ tou= xre/ous
w(?sanei\ katablhqe/ntos par' e)mou= to\ thnikau=ta u(pe\r lutrw/sews
[u(]p?[o]qh/khs gegenhme/nhs para\ tw=n au)tou= gone/wn ei)s o)/noma *)iwshfi/ou
[ui(ou= u(pe\]r tou= kth/matos u(poteqe/ntos au)tw=| para\ tw=n e)mw=n gone/wn
k?[ai\ diap]raqe/ntos u(mi=n toi=s progegramme/nois *foiba/mmwni kai\
*)anastasi/a| th=| au)tou= gameth=| para\ tw=n e)mw=n a)delfidw=n adelfitwn pro\ o)li/gou
xro/nou, fhmi\ dh\ *eu)doci/as kai\ *)antwni/as kai\ *kollou/qou, a)kolou/qws
th=| duna/mei tw=n gegenhme/nwn u(mi=n par' au)tw=n pra/sewn tou= au)tou=
k?th/matos tw=n kai\ th\n i)di/an i)sxu\n e)xousw=n. kai\ pollw=n ei)rhme/nwn kai\
kinhqe/ntwn metacu\ e)mou= *nikantino/ou kai\ *)apollw=tos prwtokwmh/tou prwtokomhtou
e)pi\ ta\ e)ntau=qa tou= kai\ a)naplhrou=ntos th\n xw/ran u(mw=n tw=n pro-
gegramme/nwn pro\ di/khs kai\ pro\ diagnwstikw=n a)gw/nwn te/los fi/loi
a)g?aqoi\ me/soi h(mw=n geno/menoi {oi(/tines} dialabo/ntes ta\ tou= pra/gmatos
e)dikai/wsan e)me\ to\n au)to\n *nikanti/noon labei=n par' u(mw=n u(pe\r pa/sh[s]
[a)]pallagh=s tou= katablhqe/ntos par' e)mou= xre/ous ei)s lu/trwsin u(poqh/khs
tou= proeirhme/nou kth/matos xrusou= nomi/smata e(pta\ e(/kaston
para\ kera/tia du/o tw=| xrusoxoi+kw=| staqmw=| th=s ei)rhme/nhs kw/mhs
*)afrodi/ths kai\ si/tou a)rta/bas ei)/kosi pentame/trw| tw=| me/trw| sou
tou= au)tou= *foiba/mmwnos tou= th\n ta/cin u(mw=n tw=n progegramme/nwn
a)?n?[a]p?lhrou=ntos. tou/twn toi/nun ou(/tw genome/nwn kai\ sterxqe/ntwn kai\
a)resqe/ntwn e)moi/ te *nikantino/w| kai\ *)apollw=ti prwtokwmh/th| prwtokomhth #324
pro\s th\n kri/sin tw=n me/swn fi/lwn tou/tou e(/neka ei)s tau/thn e)lh/luqa
th\n e)/ggrafon dialutikh\n o(mologi/an di' h(=s o(mologw= e)gw\ o( progegram-
me/nos *nikanti/noos e(kousi/a| gnw/mh| kai\ proaire/sei i)di/a| a)metanoh/tw|? kai\
a)do/lw| b?ou?lh/sei, o)rqh=| dianoi/a| di/xa do/lou panto\s kai\ fo/bou kai\ bi/as kai\
a)pa/ths kai\ a)na/gkhs ei)lhfe/nai me\n kai\ peplhrw=sqai par' u(mw=n tw=n
progegramme/nwn *foiba/mmwnos kai\ *)anastasi/as dia\ sou= tou= pro-
lexqe/ntos *)apollw=tos prwtokwmh/tou prwtokomhtou ta\ twn do/canta docantwn di/dosqai/ moi
pro\s th\n dikai/an kri/sin tw=n me/swn fi/lwn, tou=to/ e)stin toutestin nomi/smata
e(pta\ para\ kera/tia dekate/ssara kai\ si/tou a)rta/bas ei)/kosi pentame/trw|,
pro\s to\ tw e)me\ a)p' e)nteu=qen h)/dh a)nadou=nai/ soi th\n au)th\n u(poqh/khn
ei)s a)ku/rwsin, mhde/na de\ lo/gon e)/xein h)\ e(/cein pro\s u(ma=s kai\ klhrono/mous
u(mw=n kai\ diado/xous kai\ diakato/xous, mh\ pro\s to\n au)to\n *)apollw=n
kai\ tou\s au)tou= klhrono/mous, ou)k e)gw/, ou) klhrono/moi mou, ou) dia/doxoi,
ou) diaka/toxoi mh\ peri\ tou= au)tou= xre/ous tou= katablhqe/ntos par' e)mou
to\ thnikau=ta *)iwshfi/w| ei)s lu/trwsin tou= au)tou= kth/matos, mh\ peri\
th=s ei)rhme/nhs u(poqh/khs, mh\ peri\ nomh=s h)\ despotei/as tou= pro-
eirhme/nou kth/matos tou= diakeime/nou e)n em pedia/di th=s au)th=s kw/mhs
*)afrodi/ths e)n klh/rw| kaloume/nw| kaloumenon *mounlakon e)k no/tou th=s o(dou=
th=s ballou/shs e)pi\ th\n kw/mhn *tmonexqh, mh\ peri\ proso/dwn tou/tou,
mh\ peri\ oi(oudh/pote pra/gmatos a)nh/kontos tw=| au)tw=| kth/mati dikai/w|
h)\ mh\ a)nh/kontos, mikrou= h)\ mega/lou, e)ggra/fou h)\ a)gra/fou, a)kri/tou h)\
kekrime/nou to\ su/nolon, a)ll' e)/xein u(ma=s despotikw=| dikai/w| e)pi\ to\
dihneke\s th\n nomh\n kai\ th\n despotei/an tou= proeirhme/nou kth/matos
meta\ panto\s au)tou= tou= dikai/ou dia\ to\ e)me\ ei)lhfe/nai e)k plh/rous
ta\ do/canta di/dosqai/ moi par' u(mw=n dia\ sou= tou= prolexqe/ntos
*)apollw=tos, toute/stin nomi/smata e(pta\ para\ kera/tia dekate/ssara
xrusoxoi+kw=| staqmw=| th=s ei)rhme/nhs kw/mhs kai\ si/tou a)rta/bas
ei)/kosi pentame/trw|, kai\ a)phlla/xqai kai\ dialelu/sqai pro\s u(ma=s e)n a(/pasi
kai\ mhdemi/an moi tou= loipou= sw/|zesqai kaq' u(mw=n oi(andh/pote a)gwgh\n
ei)s pro/swpon h)\ kai\ ei)s pra=gma a(rmo/sasan armosashs h)\ kai\ a(rmo/sai armosoi duname/nhn dunamenhs
e)k panto\s tou= prolabo/ntos xro/nou me/xri th=s sh/meron kai\ pro-
gegramme/nhs h(me/ras kai\ ei)s to\n e(ch=s a(/panta kai\ dihnekh= xro/non kai\
mh\ du/nasqai/ me/ pote kairw=| h)\ xro/nw| e)gkalei=n u(mi=n kai\ toi=s u(mw=n
klhrono/mois e)n dikasthri/ois kai\ e)kto\s dikasthri/wn e)pixwri/w|
h)\ u(perori/w| mh\ di' e)mou=, mh\ di' e)ntole/ws, mh\ dia\ parenqe/tou prosw/pou
h)\ qei/as filotimi/as h)\ pragmatikou= tu/pou h)\ r(eskri/ptou h)\ qei/ou
neu/matos h)\ dikanikh=s leptologi/as h)\ e(te/ras oi(asdh/pote ai)ti/as
sumbh=| tau/thn a)tonh=sai h)\ me/ros merous au)th=s, a)lla\ kai\ e)sbe/sqai moi
kaq' u(mw=n kai\ kata\ tw=n u(mw=n klhrono/mwn oi(andh/pote a)gwgh\n
ei)s pro/swpon h)\ ei)s pra=gma w(s a)nwte/rw ei)/rhtai dia\ to\ mhdemi/an
metousi/an e)/xwn tou= loipou= pro\s u(ma=s peri/ te tou= au)tou= kth/matos
h)\ peri\ nomh=s tou/tou h)\ peri\ xre/ous h)\ peri\ e(te/rou tino\s pra/gmatos
a)nh/kontos tw=| au)tw=| kth/mati kai\ panto\s pan au)tou= dikai/ou dikaion to\ su/nolon
dia\ to\ e)me\ ei)lhfe/nai e)k plh/rous ta\ do/canta di/dosqai/ moi pro\s
th\n kri/sin tw=n me/swn fi/lwn, toute/stin nomi/smata e(pta\ para\ kera/tia
dekate/ssara xrusoxoi+kw=| staqmw=| kai\ si/tou a)rta/bas ei)/kosi w(s polla/kis
ei)/rhtai. kai\ prosepi\ tou/tois pa=si kai\ e)f' e(ka/stw| tw=n progegramme/nwn
kefalai/wn e)pwmosa/mhn epwmosamen th/n te a(gi/an kai\ o(moou/sion tria/da kai\
th\n eu)se/beian kai\ ni/khn tou= kallini/kou despo/tou th=s oi)koume/nhs
*flaoui/ou *)ioustinianou= tou= ai)wni/ou au)gou/stou au)tokra/toros e)mme/nein
dihnekw=s th=| duna/mei tau/ths th=s dialutikh=s o(mologi/as kai\
panti\ me/rei au)th=s kai\ kefalai/w| kai\ kata\ mhde/na tro/pon parabh=nai.
ei) de/ pote kairw=| h)\ xro/nw| tolmh/saimi parabh=nai pa/nta ta\ diomolo-
ghqe/nta par' e)mou= e)n tau/th| th=| dialutikh=| o(mologi/a| kai\ boulhqei/hn
u(penanti/on ti xwrei=n, o(mologw= parasxei=n u(mi=n lo/gw| prosti/mou
e)pi\ mo/nou tou= e)pixeirh/matos th=s paraba/sews xrusou= nomisma/tia
ei)kosite/ssara e)/rgw| kai\ duna/mei a)paitou/mena pro\s tw=| u(pokei=sqai/ me
tw=| th=s e)piorkei/as epiorkias kindu/nw| kai\ toi=s w(risme/nois kata\ no/mous e)pitimi/ois
kata\
tw=n parabai/nein e)pixeirou/ntwn ta\s e)nwmo/tous e(autw=n sunqh/kas,
ou)de\n de\ <h(=tton> kai\ pro\ tou= prosti/mou kai\ meta\ th\n tou= prosti/mou katabolh/n,
ei)/ pote pro\s a)pai/thsin a(rmo/soi armosai, a)rragh= kai\ a)sa/leuton ei)=nai tau/thn
th\n dialutikh\n o(mologi/an dia\ panto\s h(/nper u(mi=n e)qe/mhn
pro\s a)sfa/leian kuri/an ou)=san kai\ bebai/an u(poqe/menos u(mi=n
ei)s a(/panta ta\ progegramme/na kai\ ei)s th\n tou= prosti/mou a)pai/thsin,
ei) ou(/tw tu/xoi, pa/nta ta\ nu=n o)/nta moi kai\ e)so/mena pra/gmata kinhta/ te
kai\ a)ki/nhta kai\ au)toki/nhta e)nexu/rou lo/gw| kai\ u(poqh/khs
dikai/w| kaqa/per e)k di/khs: kai\ ei)s ta\ progegramme/na pa/nta
e)perwthqei\s par' u(mw=n tau=q' ou(/tws e)/xein, dw/sein, poiei=n, fula/ttein,
e)mme/nein, plhrw/sein, ei)s pe/ras a)/gein w(molo/ghsa. *au)rh/lios *nikanti/noos
*)isidw/rou o( progegramme/nos e)qe/mhn tau/thn th\n dialutikh\n
o(mologi/an e)sxhkw\s esxhkos exekos e)k plh/rous ta\ do/canta, toute/stin
nomisma/tia e(pta\ kai\ si/tou a)rta/bas ei)/kosi eikosei , kai\ w)/mosa omisa
to\n qei=on o(/rkon orkwn e)pi\ tw=| prosti/mw| prwstimw kai\ pei/qomai piqwmai pa=si toi=s
e)ggegramme/nois w(s os pro/keitai kai\ u(pogra/yas a)pe/lusa apalasa. *au)rh/lios
*moush=s *yai/ou suntelesth\s a)po\ th=s au)th=s kw/mhs *)afrodi/ths
eu(reqei\s e)n *)antino/ou marturw= th=| o(mologi/a| omologian h)/toi dialu/sei
a)kou/sas para\ tou= qeme/nou. *(ermaw=s *bo/ttou a)po\ th=s au)th=s
kw/mhs *)afrodi/ths eu(reqei\s e)n *)antino/ou marturw= th=|
dialutikh=| o(mologi/a| a)kou/sas para\ tou= qeme/nou. *au)rh/lios
*senou/qhs *)apollw=tos a)po\ th=s au)th=s kw/mhs *)afrodi/ths eu(reqei\s
e)n *)antino/ou marturw= th=| dialutikh=| o(mologi/a| a)kou/sas para\ tou= qeme/nou.
*au)rh/lios *)apollw=s *bhs?i/?ou a)po\ th=s au)th=s kw/mhs *)afr[o]di/ths eu(r[eqei\]s?
e)n *)antin?o/ou m[artu]r[w= th=| d]ial?[ut]i?k?h=| o(mo?l?o?gi/[a| a)kou/]sas para\ tou= qem?e/?[nou].
*f[][][]taouk?[]hq?[]t?[] l[]d[] a)?ko?u/?[s]a?s? pa?ra\ tou= qeme/?[nou].
